title: Short-Intensive Surgical Education Program Using Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and human anatomy comprehension
context.additional_context: A non-real-time online learning environment combining smartphone-based multimedia materials (video/text) with PBL (Problem-Based Learning) problem-solving worksheets.

learning_goals: Learners can identify key treatment steps in trauma surgery cases with 80% accuracy.
Using provided multimedia materials, over 70% of learners can explain the surgical technique decision-making process.
Learners can demonstrate decision-making skills rated at 4 points or higher (out of 5) on the PBL problem-solving rubric.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
